name: humidificationMode_setValue
description: This function is used to change the humidification mode of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to change the humidification mode.

parameters.name: predefinedHumidificationMode
parameters.description: The predefined humidification mode to set (e.g., auto, medium, high, low).
